front.title: Summary report for the virtual workshop addressing public comment on NIST cybersecurity for IoT guidance

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This report summarizes the feedback received on the work of the NIST Cybersecurity for IoT program on device cybersecurity at a virtual workshop conducted April 22, 2021. NIST conducted the Workshop Addressing Public Comment on NIST Cybersecurity for IoT Guidance to discuss and gather community input on the December 2020 public drafts of NISTIR 8259D, Profile Using the IoT Core Baseline and Non-Technical Baseline for the Federal Government, and SP 800-213, IoT Device Cybersecurity Guidance for the Federal Government: Establishing IoT Device Cybersecurity Requirements. This publication provides a summary of the workshop.
